medi:segment.name: Beginning of message
medi:segment.medi:documentation: BGM, A segment specifying the type of message contained in the transmission.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the reporting period ending date.

medi:segment.name: Currencies
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CUX, A segment identifying the default currency and its scaling factor for monetary amounts in this message.

medi:segment.name: Contact information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CTA, A segment identifying a person(s) or department(s), and their function(s), to whom communications should be directed.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation:
FTX, A segment with free text information, in coded or clear form, used when additional information is needed but cannot be accommodated within other segments.
4.1.2 Detail section
Information to be provided in the Detail section:

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 1: A group of segments in which is detailed claim information.

medi:segment.name: Item description
medi:segment.medi:documentation: IMD, A segment defining the type of claim.

medi:segment.name: Attribute
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ATT, A segment providing attributes of the claim.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment specifying general dates or durations related to the claim.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment giving location information for the place of death or location where the onset of the disability occurred.

medi:segment.name: Percentage details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PCD, A segment specifying the extent of loss and the interest rate to be used in calculating the claim payment.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment specifying the claim numbers as assigned by the ceding company and the reinsurer.

medi:segment.name: Currencies
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CUX, A segment identifying the default currency and its scaling factor for monetary amounts for the claim.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment with free text information, in coded or clear form, used when additional information is needed regarding the claim.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 2: A group of segments in which is detailed monetary amounts and their purpose for the claim.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment specifying a monetary amount.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount function
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ARD, A segment specifying the purpose of the monetary amount.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 3: A group of segments in which is detailed information regarding the person for which this claim is being submitted.

medi:segment.name: Party identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PNA, A segment identifying the name of the person on claim.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment specifying general date and durations associated with the person on claim.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment giving location information for the place of residence of the person on claim at the time of loss.

medi:segment.name: Employment details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EMP, A segment providing the occupation class of the person on claim at time of loss for purposes of this claim as defined by the issuing company.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 4: A group of segments in which is detailed monetary amounts and their purpose for this person on claim.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment specifying a monetary amount.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount function
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ARD, A segment specifying the purpose of the monetary amount.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 5: A group of segments in which is detailed information regarding the policy on claim and other policies related to the claim.

medi:segment.name: Processing information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GEI, An indicator specifying whether this policy is the policy on claim or an associated policy.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment specifying the policy number as assigned by the ceding company.

medi:segment.name: Party identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PNA, A segment identifying the original issuer of the policy, in coded or clear form.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment specifying general dates and durations associated with the policy on claim or related policy.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 6: A group of segments in which is detailed monetary amounts and their purpose for this policy.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment specifying a monetary amount.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount function
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ARD, A segment specifying the purpose of the monetary amount.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 7: A group of segments in which is detailed information regarding the insureds on this policy.

medi:segment.name: Identity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: IDE, A segment identifying the party as the insured of record.

medi:segment.name: Party identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PNA, A segment identifying the insured's name and universal identifier.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the date of birth of the insured.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 8: A group of segments in which is detailed coverage information regarding the insured.

medi:segment.name: Insurance cover description
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ICD, A segment giving the insurance cover type associated with this coverage.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment specifying general dates or durations related to this coverage.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment specifying general references for this coverage.

medi:segment.name: Attribute
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ATT, A segment providing attributes of the coverage.

medi:segment.name: Percentage details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PCD, A segment specifying the percentages associated with the claim.

medi:segment.name: Agreement identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: AGR, A segment identifying the treaty as assigned by the ceding company.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 9: A group of segments in which is detailed monetary amounts and their purpose for the coverage.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment specifying a monetary amount.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount function
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ARD, A segment specifying the purpose of the monetary amount.
